Script Tabs

Script Tabs is a plugin I wrote to satisfy my development needs in roblox.
I found that organizing my code, specially in big portions, was a humongous task,
due to the amount of scrolling (and looking around) that was necessary.
This plugin aims to solve this issue, by allowing user defined "tabs" that can be
navigated to automatically at the press of a button

I found it very useful in big scripts, that reached over 300 lines to portion
my code down to bite size chunks, so I thought to release the plugin to whoever else needs it!
